name: RiddleChallenge
0:
”Alexa open Riddle Challenge”
”Alexa play Riddle Challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: riddle challenge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill is a part of Puzzle Games.

In this game, you will face a Riddle Challenge. I will ask you a riddle, and your task is to guess the correct answer. If you're stuck, you can ask for a hint. There are 3 levels of difficulty for the riddles. Easy, Medium and Hard.

Keep answering riddles to see how many you can get right in a row to beat your high score. If you can’t think of the answer, ask for another riddle or start again.

Good Luck!

If you launch this skill, it will tell you to open Puzzle Games.

HUGO FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
